Articles.Content: I have 211 pieces of debris in orbit. What's the easiest way to delete them? I've tried point-n-click. And I've tried to edit the persistent file. Both processes are maddening. ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)
In the setting menu. Set persistent debris slider to 0.
